item.title: Historical Microcks release notes
item.description: Older Releases Microcks core 1.3.0 on 30 Jun 2021 We are so proud and happy to share this new 1.3.0 and important Microcks release two months in advance based on our initial roadmap! Yes, this was yet another big challenge ðŸŽ‰ Kudos to our community users and partners for supporting and pushing us to this momentum. Here are the main changes and enhancements of this release: The support of AsyncAPI v2.

item.title: News about Microcks
item.description: Fresh Releases Microcks core 1.5.0 on 18 Jan 2022 We are excited to announce the 1.5.0 release of Microcks ðŸš€ Thanks to our supporters in the community that helped us push up a new release with significant features. This release puts again the focus on our vision of a unique tool with a consistent approach for ALL kinds of APIs. The major addition if the support of GraphQL thats makes Microcks the only tools able to simulate and realize contract-testing on REST, SOAP, gRPC, Events and GraphQL based APIs.
